parameters.subject: =Site Notice {{ $('Reject NID').item.json["OwnedSnid"] }}: Further Corrective Action Required

parameters.query:
SELECT 
    SN.SiteNoticeID,
    SN.Issued_To,
    SN.Issue_To_Email,
    SN.Created,
    SN.CreatedBy,
    SN.Open_Days,
    SN.Status,
    SN.Project_ID,
    P.Project_Name, -- Added Project_Name from the Projects table
    SNI.Notice_ID,
    SNI.Site_Notice_ID,
    SNI.Sign_Off_Status,
    SNI.List_ID
FROM 
    Site_Notices AS SN
JOIN 
    Site_Notice_Items AS SNI
ON 
    SN.SiteNoticeID = SNI.Site_Notice_ID
JOIN
    Projects AS P -- Joining the Projects table
ON
    SN.Project_ID = P.Project_ID -- Matching the Project_ID in both tables
WHERE
    SNI.Sign_Off_Status = 4;
